QuestData.Title: Get Me Explosives Back!
QuestData.Description: It's gonna take a lot of powder ta collapse those caves. I don't know whether th' damnable troggs understood that when they stole me supplies and kidnapped me demolitionists! But th' outcome's th' same.$B$BAin't gonna be able ta blow nothin' up until I've got that powder back.$B$BGo south to Frostmane Hold and kill any o' those troggs you find. Any one o' 'em could be carryin' me kegs o' powder.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 7 Stolen Powder Kegs from Rockjaw Bonepickers or Rockjaw Marauders at Frostmane Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, now, that's more like it. We may get around to blowin' up somethin' after all.
